(Count ê°’ì´ 0ì¼ ê²½ìš° ìˆœìœ„ëŠ” 6ìœ„)   ê²°ê³¼  cpp include string include vector include algorithm  using namespace std;  vectorint solution(vectorint lottos, vectorint winnums) { vectorint result(2); vectorint::iterator it;  for (sizet i = 0; i  2; i++) { for (sizet j = 0; j  6; j++) {  it = find(winnums.begin(), winnums.end(), lottos[j]);  if (i == 0) { // ìµœê³ ì¼ ë•Œ if (it != winnums.end() || lottos[j] == 0) result[i]++; } else { // ìµœì €ì¼ ë•Œ if (it != winnums.end()) result[i]++; } } if (result[i] != 0) result[i] = (result[i] - 7)  -1; else result[i] = 6; } return result; }
